mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOK_REPLY (BOOK_NO, MEMBER_ID, BOOK_REPLY_CONTENT, BOOK_REPLY_CREATED, BOOK_RATING) VALUES (#{bookNo}, 'ADMIN', #{bookReplyContent}, SYSDATE, #{bookRating})
mapper.select: SELECT A.BOOK_REPLY_NO, A.BOOK_NO, A.MEMBER_ID, A.BOOK_REPLY_CONTENT, A.BOOK_REPLY_CREATED, A.BOOK_RATING FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BOOK_REPLY_NO DESC) AS RN, BOOK_REPLY_NO, BOOK_NO, MEMBER_ID, BOOK_REPLY_CONTENT, BOOK_REPLY_CREATED, BOOK_RATING FROM BOOK_REPLY)A WHERE A.RN BETWEEN #{beginRecord} AND #{endRecord}
